content.question: How is the sentence translated?

choices.label: After his midday meal, the king will rest in two or three hours.
After his midday meal, the king was resting for two or three hours.
After their midday meals, two or three kings were resting for hours.
After their midday meals, the kings were resting at the second or third hour.

content.answer: After his midday meal, the king was resting for two or three hours.
